mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.first_picture, b.commentable, b.flag, b.published, b.share_statement, b.recommend, b.description, b.user_id, b.views, b.create_time FROM rniyablog.t_blog b WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT b.`title`, b.`id`, b.`first_picture`, b.`create_time`, b.`flag`, b.`views`, b.`description`, COUNT(c.`id`) commentCount FROM rniyablog.`t_blog` b LEFT JOIN rniyablog.`t_comment` c ON c.`blog_id` = b.`id` GROUP BY b.id
select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.description, b.content, b.create_time, b.views, b.published, b.recommend, b.flag from rniyablog.t_blog b
mapper.insert: insert into rniyablog.t_blog(id, title, content, first_picture, commentable, flag, published, share_statement, recommend, description, user_id, views, create_time) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{commentable}, #{flag}, #{published}, #{shareStatement}, #{recommend}, #{description}, #{userId}, #{views}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update rniyablog.t_blog set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, first_picture = #{firstPicture}, commentable = #{commentable}, flag = #{flag}, published = #{published}, share_statement = #{shareStatement}, recommend = #{recommend}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SUM(b.`views`) views, COUNT(b.`id`) blogs, COUNT(c.`id`) comments FROM rniyablog.`t_blog` b LEFT JOIN rniyablog.`t_comment` c ON b.`id` = c.`blog_id`
SELECT b.id, b.title,b.first_picture,b.description,b.content,b.create_time, b.views, b.published, b.recommend, b.flag FROM rniyablog.t_blog b WHERE b.title LIKE #{title}

SELECT b.`title`, b.`id`, b.`first_picture`, b.`create_time`, b.`flag`, b.`views`, b.`description` FROM rniyablog.`t_blog` b WHERE b.`id` IN (SELECT bt.`blog_id` FROM rniyablog.`blog_tags` bt WHERE bt.`tag_id` = #{tagId})
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.`create_time`, '%Y') AS YEAR FROM rniyablog.`t_blog` b GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY YEAR DESC
SELECT * FROM rniyablog.`t_blog` b WHERE b.`create_time` LIKE #{pattern} ORDER BY b.`create_time` DESC
SELECT * FROM rniyablog.`t_blog` b WHERE b.title = #{title} AND b.user_id = #{userId}
